title: Colorado Springs: Gunman shoots dead six people and himself at birthday party
description: The suspect opened fire in a mobile home before taking his own life, police in Colorado Springs say.

title: Sir David Attenborough: Problems that await greater than the epidemic
description: The broadcaster calls on nations to act in agreement as he is appointed People's Advocate at COP26.

title: Hvaldimir: Seeking sanctuary for whale dubbed a Russian spy
description: A campaign to protect a mysterious beluga whale near Norway is gathering pace - but will it work?

title: Labour reshuffle: Anneliese Dodds out in Starmer's post-election reshuffle
description: Shadow chancellor Anneliese Dodds is replaced by Rachel Reeves as Sir Keir Starmer changes his top team.

title: India Covid: Kumbh Mela pilgrims turn into super-spreaders
description: When millions turned up for the Hindu festival amid a coronavirus surge, many feared the worst.

title: Covid-19 pandemic: Sex workers in Germany 'at risk'
description: Sex workers in Germany say a countrywide ban on the industry forces many into poverty and danger.

title: McIlroy wins at Quail Hollow for first title since 2019
description: Rory McIlroy ends his winless run by clinching the Wells Fargo Championship just six weeks after starting work with coach Pete Cowen.

title: Covid: 'Miracle' baby born to Newport mum in coma
description: Doctors were not sure Marriam Ahmad and her unborn daughter would survive after she was ventilated.

title: Arsenal 3-1 West Bromwich Albion: Baggies relegated after defeat
description: West Bromwich Albion are relegated from the Premier League for a fifth time after a 3-1 defeat against Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.

title: Golden Globes controversy: Scarlett Johansson joins criticism
description: The actress has backed a host of stars criticising the awards over how it is tackling discrimination.

title: Rail disruption set to continue after train cracks found
description: Rail firms GWR and LNER warn of issues on long-distance routes after cracks were found on some trains.

title: Saunders to have surgery on eye socket after loss to Alvarez
description: Billy Joe Saunders will have surgery on Sunday after suffering "multiple fractures" to his eye socket in his loss to Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez.

title: 'At least we don't travel back to a party on the Blue side' - Solskjaer happy to delay title celebrations
description: Manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer says Manchester United will fight to delay Manchester City's Premier League title celebrations "as long as we can".

title: Five defining games in Chelsea's WSL title triumph
description: After Chelsea successfully defender their Women's Super League title, which five games stand out as defining their season?

title: Analysis: Is the Green Party on the rise - and if so, why?
description: Are the party's gains in Thursday's polls a flash in the pan or the start of something bigger, asks Chris Mason.

title: Meghan warns of pandemic impact on women
description: The Duchess of Sussex speaks about the pandemic's impact on women.

title: Scottish independence: Could the Supreme Court rule on a referendum?
description: Scotland's First Minister Nicola Sturgeon wants a referendum on independence, but Boris Johnson does not.

title: Wales election 2021: Labour set to form new Welsh government alone
description: Election result allows them to work with parties on a "case-by-case basis", a minister says.

title: Election results 2021: PM calls Covid recovery summit after SNP victory
description: It comes as Boris Johnson and SNP clash over the prospect of another Scottish independence referendum.

title: Selfridges: Eight arrested after man stabbed inside Oxford Street store
description: Footage shows a man wielding a knife in front of shoppers inside the famous department store.

title: Scottish election 2021: Results in maps and charts
description: The picture across Scotland as the SNP win a fourth consecutive victory in the Scottish Parliament.

title: Chinese rocket debris crashes into Indian Ocean - state media
description: Most of the Chinese Long March-5b rocket reportedly disintegrated as it re-entered the atmosphere.

title: Elections 2021: Sir Keir Starmer set to reshuffle Labour's top team
description: Party leader plans a major shake-up after losing elections to the Conservatives across England.

title: Sir John Curtice: What the 2021 election results mean for the parties
description: Prof Sir John Curtice says the ruling parties appear to have done well in Thursday's bumper crop of elections.

title: ICYMI: Nine babies and a giant squid
description: A surprise delivery for a mum in Morocco and questionable spending in Japan - news you may have missed.

title: The Papers: Labour's 'civil war', and PM wants UK to 'unite'
description: Fallout from the nationwide elections continues to feature prominently on the front pages

title: Prince Michael of Kent accused of selling Kremlin access
description: The Queen's cousin denies he has close ties to Vladimir Putin after an undercover investigation.

title: Jerusalem: Many injured on second night of clashes
description: Some 90 Palestinians and at least one Israeli police officer are hurt in a further night of violence.

title: Akala: Why we need more black, working class period drama
description: Akala speaks to Radio 1 Newsbeat about filling the gaps in historical fiction.

title: 'I thought strokes only happened to elderly people'
description: Three young stroke survivors share their stories to help raise awareness.

title: Joe Ligon: America's 'longest juvenile lifer' on 68 years in prison
description: After waiting seven decades for freedom, Joe Ligon tells the BBC how he intends to spend the rest of his days.

title: Sophie Scholl: Student who resisted Hitler and inspires Germany
description: Germany marks the 100th anniversary of the birth of Sophie Scholl, who was killed defying the Nazis.
